channel.title: Door bug
channel.description: in the varrok sewers theres the door to enter were the ghosts are (were they are in runescape)but when you open it you stil cant get past. invisable dor or something[br][size=1]Posted on: May 10, 2007, 09:59:03 AM[/size][hr]nvm ill just have them be teleported on other side of door when they click on it, ty anyway. sry fer thread:\[br][size=1]Posted on: May 10, 2007, 10:08:40 AM[/size][hr]o nvm bad idea is tehre way that if ppl step on X Y they get telepoted to X Y

item.title: Door bug
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

ahh awsome thanks,
isint
if(objectID == OBJECTSIDHERE)
{
suppose to go infront of it
ex:

                if(objectID == OBJECTSIDHERE)
                if (absX == x && absY == y) {
                    teleportToX = x;
                    teleportToY = y;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	sendMessage("Comment.");
                }

cause i dont see where it says to put in the object that they click on, cuase some places you could be surrounded by objects and i want it to be the one i want :\

im probly wrong above but im learning and looking into it

Read full topic

item.title: Door bug
item.dc:creator: @KiIIer KiIIer
item.description:
@KiIIer wrote:

if (absX == 3093 && absY == 3957) { teleportToX = 3092; teleportToY = 3957; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; sendMessage("You slash the webs."); }
that is an example of one of my mage bank webs. Where it says absX == 3093 && absY == 3957)

that means that if you are standing at 3093, 3957 and click on a web it will tele you to a certain spot. The reason for this is because not all webs are different so you have to specify where it teles you depending on where you are standing when you activate this. You can do the same thing with the door. I will try and find the case and will edit back when I do.

EDIT: there are many types of doors. Go in game and find the object id and use that to find the correct one.

Read full topic

item.title: Door bug
item.dc:creator: @KiIIer KiIIer
item.description:
@KiIIer wrote:

The only way I know if is to go to the case and make it so you have to be on the X coordinate and the Y coordinate right in front of the door and then when you click on it, it will tele you one space in either Y or X direction. If what I say is confusing go into your client.java and look at the magebank webs. I believe the case is 733.

Read full topic
